cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: These Rooms are Great For the Budget Traveller The room is in a Cottage with 6 other rooms you have a small kitchenette Your own Toilet & Shower 1 x Queen size bed Television Great Value for the budget Traveler Please note no aircon in this  room type

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Excellent value for the price conscious - well equipt Compact Room with en suite, small fridge, microwave, tea/toast/coffee making facilities and tv Please note these room types are small but great for the budget conscious. FREE WIFI AND AIRCON

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
These room are great for 1-3 Traveler's the room has 1 x Queen Bed and 1 x Single bed The nightly rate is for 3 guests  Total Guest this room can sleep is 3
 FREE WIFI AND AIRCON

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
